definition: to revolve/to turn/to circle about/to walk about/classifier for revolutions (per minute etc): revs, rpm/classifier for repeated actions
to turn/to change direction/to transfer/to forward (mail)
(of sth) to move/to set in movement/to displace/to touch/to make use of/to stir (emotions)/to alter/abbr. for 動詞|动词[dong4 ci2], verb
axis/axle/spool (for thread)/roller (for scrolls)/classifier for calligraphy rolls etc
see 壓軸戲|压轴戏[ya1 zhou4 xi4]/Taiwan pr. [zhou2]

sentences.english: It works like a tape, except that there are no moving spools .
sentences.chinese: 這一工作原理就像磁帶，只是沒有轉動軸。

sentences.english: One end of the rotation axle is connected with an electromagnet by a pull rod and a weight rod.
sentences.chinese: 轉動軸的一端通過拉桿和重錘杆與電磁鐵相連。

sentences.english: The second hollow space receives a rotation shaft.
